alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 11:10AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coconino and Yavapai Counties through 1145 AM MST... At 1110 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northeast of Diamond M Ranch, or 47 miles northeast of Kingman, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Coconino and Yavapai Counties. This includes Route 66 between mile markers 110 and 122. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
